mapper.insert: INSERT INTO join_event( join_event_no , user_email , reward_no , reg_date) VALUES ( seq_join_event_join_event_no.NEXTVAL, #{userEmail:VARCHAR} , #{rewardNo:INTEGER} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT j.join_event_no , j.user_email , r.event_no , r.reward , j.reg_date FROM join_event j, reward r WHERE j.reward_no = r.reward_no AND j.user_email = #{userEmail} GROUP BY j.join_event_no, j.user_email, r.event_no, r.reward, j.reg_date ORDER BY j.join_event_no
